post.body: - I know! Canadians. Well, I hear it's purty cold....gotta stay warm!
- Thanks! Will keep trying....all I get is that over capacity messge tho! Grrrrrrrr.
@maniar Gee....I guess "Do Him" Friday night in Canada is a Big Deal, eh? LOL! (pervs)
perv
Heck NO! @Theresa111 asked me to do him! :)
Twue! :) Maybe Jaffer can help him out with a yellow one.
I have no idea who that is! @twitmastree!
Arnt they CUTE! :) They are @DrowseyMonkey's
What?
They are too frickin adorable....
LOL! Extra anchovies please!
I heard that somewhere before....maybe my cat?
I KNOW! You're welcome! I think they are hilarious!!! :)
Yummy & cozy! :)
- I LOVE your animals in Santa Hats!!!!!
-We should never underestimate the power of a Santa Hat again! :)
- Another Great Christmas Story! http://tinyurl.com/63gtsd
I will be thinking about this allllll day. I love Fuel My Blog!
How did it fall over?
Oh but you will! If we get it it's like a miracle!
I no see snow..????
I dont understand anything you said....but thanks for the warning! :)
I'm me again...
Good! :)
A local theatre company did that show a couple of years ago too...they stuck right to the story...'twas great - loved it!
YAY! Mine too....this is my favorite time of the week....
Good! Stay that way. :)
I am loving your Christmas Story quotes! I need to watch that...have the DVD...one of my my favorite movies!
Nice hat! :)
Hey you!
-11/-40?!?! I prolly don't need to remind you to wear your hat & sock today....
DRIVE SAFELY Speedy!!!
http://twitpic.com/wizr - It looks like it was GOOD! :)
Why not take the sleigh?....get there faster!
Up on the the tree top???
Christmas Blessings to you Kuanyin! xoxo
That tickled! :) ho ho ho!
HAHA! Guess I phrased that wrong! Come to think of it....they ARE kinda quiet...better go check!
Good idea! Do you think we'll be able to make it wiggle?
I like that! Merry Christmukkah!
I will save it for next year! :)
Eatin' my Chirstmas oatmeal! :) Saving room for cookies & crapola!
Merry Christmas! :)
COAL? no way! HAHAHA!
Are you gonna be a hugger now? YAY!!!
How far is he from Chico?
@maniar Merry Christmas! I still have 3 hours to go!
Merry Chistmas Jay!
That's 'cuz everything tastes better in my cup! I cant believe I just said that!
http://twitpic.com/sc3h - @Theresa111 - Here is @pickensplan's Santa Hat. Do you want to tell him it's ready? :)
http://twitpic.com/sbv7 - What Santa needs to pull his sleigh....
http://twitpic.com/sbvh - These cats look very excited about their Santa Hats!
http://twitpic.com/sbvh - @DrowseyMonkey Meow Meow Meow-wy Christmas!
http://twitpic.com/sbv7 - @DrowseyMonkey Tweet Tweet Tweet!!!
I love blogging! My cups overfloweth today with good cheer today! :)
It really did ALMOST snow here today! It's snowing in the foothils about 8 miles east.....finally feels like winter!
http://twitpic.com/t336 - @LadyBanana - I love your picture! But you need a Santa Hat! Here it is!
Kids are all plugged into new electronic devices....everyone's HAPPY! :)
MERRY CHRISTMAS TO ALL MY FRIENDS! That's YOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!
Olga Update!!! Merry Christmas Everyone!: Enjoy this day! xoxo~Olga http://tinyurl.com/8bz5nv
